featured.text: The major problem with the space trash is that it may hit working satellites and damage traveling spacecraft.
They are also used on ships and spacecraft for their greater structural integrity.

definition.zh_def: 太空船，指用於太空探索或運輸的飛行器。
definition.en_def: A vehicle designed for travel or operation in outer space.
definition.example: The spacecraft successfully landed on Mars after a seven-month journey.
